# collapsedRepresentationImage

**Instance Property**

The image displayed by the button for the default collapsed representation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var collapsedRepresentationImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var collapsedRepresentationImage: NSImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopoverTouchBarItem/collapsedRepresentation] button has been replaced by a different view, this property may not have any effect.

## Configuring the collapsed popover

- **collapsedRepresentation**: The view displayed when this item is displayed in its parent bar.
- **collapsedRepresentationLabel**: The localized string displayed by the button for the default collapsed representation.
